import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Users, IndianRupee, Clock, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; import './JobCard.css'; import indianflag from "../../assets/indian-flag.avif"; const JobCard = ({ id, // Pass job ID for navigation companyName, companyLogo, jobPosition, hiringCount, monthlySalary, jobType, workType, location, skillsRequired, }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Hook for navigation const skills = skillsRequired.split(','); return (

{jobPosition}

{hiringCount}
â‚¹{monthlySalary || 'N/A'}
{workType}
{jobType}
{location}
{skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Navigate to JobDetails page */}
); }; export default JobCard;
